title: cold kimchi-sesame ramen
ingredients: 1 scoop kimchi; cut into very small pieces if large
instructions: Bring a pot of water to a boil.
While the water is heating, combine the soy sauce, sesame oil, black sesame seeds, and green onion in a mixing or serving bowl.
Add the ramen to the boiling water. Stir after a couple minutes to break up the noodles.
When the noodles are still slightly toothy, add the spinach to the pot to cook briefly.
Once the noodles are done, drain and rinse under cold water.
Add the noodles and spinach to the bowl with the sauce and mix well.
Top with a scoop of kimchi before serving.
notes: Could be good with an egg or tofu. For a spicier version, add a dash of gochujang or chili crisp.
